about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Yasons Chemex Care Limited is engaged in the manufacturing business. They manufacture dyes and pigment paste, and FMCG products.

In the dyes segment, they manufacture a wide variety of dyes such as basic dyes, reactive dyes, food colorants, direct dyes, and vat dyes. They offer multiple shades of dyes. Further, the dye manufacturing undertaken by the company can be broadly classified under the following types-

  • Natural dyes
  • Synthetic dyes
  • Synthetic organic dyes

The other business segments of Yasons Chemex Care Limited are manufacturing pigment paste from various chemicals and FMCG products manufacturing or packaging. The FMCG products include hair oil, perfumes, deodorant, handmade soap, sanitizer, etc.

The products of Yasons Chemex Care Limited are marketed under their brand name "PLXO".

Yasons Chemex Care also trades in dyes, pigment, and pigment paste in order to meet customer requirements.

The products manufactured by the company are directly or indirectly applied by various industries like textile, paper, paints, inks, soap, plastic, wood, detergents and FMCG.

The Company has two manufacturing facilities situated in the state of Gujarat. They manufacture dyes and pigment paste at our manufacturing facility situated at A-1/329, Phase-II, G.I.D.C, Vatva, Ahmedabad, having an installed capacity of 650 MTPA per annum.

Further, the Company manufactures FMCG products at the second manufacturing facility situated at 22, Shreeji Krupa Estate, Tajpur Road, Changodar.

faqs.question: What is the Yasons Chemex Care IPO?
faqs.answer:
Yasons Chemex Care IPO is a SME IPO of 5142000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.57 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on July 24, 2023, and closes on July 26, 2023.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Yasons Chemex Care IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Yasons Chemex Care IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Yasons Chemex Care IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Yasons Chemex Care IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Yasons Chemex Care IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Yasons Chemex Care IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Yasons Chemex Care IPO opens on July 24, 2023 and closes on July 26, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Yasons Chemex Care IPO?
faqs.answer: Yasons Chemex Care IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Yasons Chemex Care IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Yasons Chemex Care IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Yasons Chemex Care IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Yasons Chemex Care IPO will be done on Monday, July 31, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, August 2, 2023. Check the Yasons Chemex Care IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Yasons Chemex Care IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Yasons Chemex Care IPO listing date is on Thursday, August 3, 2023.
